def entance(N):
    sum_of_digits = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(N)))
    binary = bin(sum_of_digits)[3:]
    return binary

def entance(N):
    sum_of_digits = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(N)))
    binary = bin(sum_of_digits)[1:]
    return binary

def entance(N):
    sum_of_digits = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(N)))
    binary = bin(sum_of_digits)[0:]
    return binary

def entance(N):
    sum_of_digits = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(N)))
    binary = bin(sum_of_digits)[1:]
    return binary

def entance(N):
    sum_of_digits = sum((int(digit) for digit in str(N)))
    binary = bin(sum_of_digits)[-2:]
    return binary
